id: scenario-value-scanner-idd-community-scenarios-educational-exploring career interests through accessible career education
title: Exploring career interests through accessible career education
description: Exploring career interests through accessible career education
content:
Scenario: Exploring career interests through accessible career education
    Given Jordan might want to explore other career options
    And career exploration supports life planning
    When Jordan uses career exploration resources
    Then the personal_agent shows career options with pictures and simple descriptions
    And Jordan can learn about different jobs through videos and stories
    And Jordan can explore interests without pressure to commit
    And the educational_elohim provides information about training pathways
    And Jordan's career dreams are taken seriously, not dismissed
    And Jordan experiences hope and possibility through education
